fireball.description: Failure to complete the assembly of [DATA EXPUNGED] will result in Dr. N-E-S-S terminating the [DATA EXPUNGED] and casting the husk away.

effects.title: Gone
effects.text: poof.

fireball.name: PK THUNDER

triplet.name: Void Cluster
triplet.description: A tool of the resistance to nullify effects done to [REDACTED].

difire.name: Sacrifice
difire.description: After termination, patients must be kept in an ice bath for a total of 168 hours. Every 24 hours, the patient must be sterilized with heat before resuming the freezing process.

effects.title: Blank
effects.text: help

gravity.name: Event C-5
gravity.description: In the event of a C-5 occurence, higher ranks must decimate any proof the site they were currently working at ever existed.

effects.title: Silence
effects.text: All that would be left is the emergency anomaly chambers, which come in pairs of 2 for each worksite in the [DATA EXPUNGED].

link.description: In the event that a pack of [REDACTED] are in danger, they may fuse itselves together.

effects.title: Unnatural
effects.text: please im begging you -mag

link.name: Fuse

grapple.description: For any discarded [DATA EXPUNGED], the Disposal System will clean them and i̶n̶c̶i̶n̶e̶r̶a̶t̶e̶  cast them into the void.

effects.title: Lost
effects.text: Patients thrown into the void may hallucinate that they instead wake up at the "edge" of the void.

grapple.name: Disposal System

homing.description: The now successful [REDACTED] will hunt in packs, each carrying armed shotguns. These weapons are designed to stay inside the body on contact.

effects.title: Hurt
effects.text: you are being used you are being used -magnolia

homing.name: Arms

repeater.description: A vortex which nothing can escape from.
repeater.name: Black Hole

drain.description: Once the sacrifice is complete, the remains of a patient will be poured into a 15mx15mx15m spherical cast.

effects.title: Divide
effects.text: Something... is off.

drain.name: Husk

shield.name: Bullet Flare
shield.description: TAK LITE TACTICAL FLASHLIGHTS ARE SO AMAZING PLEASE SPONSOR RAY

effects.title: Explodes
effects.text: The Acolyte can start spewing blood and bleed to death to avoid resistance tampering.

halo.name: Blessed
halo.description: Once the casting process is complete, they will be thrown into the void to hunt our opposers.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: You can stop this! You can stop this! -Maggie

teleport.description: In the event that an [REDACTED] cannot spew blood, they are programmed to run.

effects.title: Run
effects.text: But from what?

teleport.name: run

thrust.name: Death Roll
thrust.description: You, the [REDACTED] reading this file, are required to roll into the void if confronted in a disadvantageous situation.

effects.title: You remember
effects.text: Her. You can't roll away now. You sweat as you hold a shotgun in your hand.

voidRush.name: Purity
voidRush.description: A resistance act of purging yourself of all things not ethereal.

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: im so sorry why didnt this work for you why didnt it? i miss you so much. you're beside me and i cannot recognize you. - mag

bullet-hell.name: Class B amnestic
bullet-hell.description: im so sorry -dr [TERMINATED. Now undergoing the casting process.]

effects.title: [DATA EXPUNGED]
effects.text: Paralyzed. Someone else is controlling you.

obstacle.name: Channel
obstacle.description: The [REDACTED] will expunge, and consequently weaponize its former emotion.

effects.title: please
effects.text: i can fix you i can fix you just please don't be another casualty

yeet.name: Arsonist Hellflame
yeet.description: A twisted version of the holy light given by our lord our only lord our only lord our onl-

effects.title: im sorry
effects.text: forgive me! this one was a mistake! i just cant live without you! please, just a few more spells -mag

effects.title: hate
effects.text: you hate this you hate this

mines2.name: i love you maggy
mines2.description: Disables spells caused by threats to the [REDACTED].

effects.title: im almost done
effects.text: just a few more spells i promise -mag

rcoke.name: Wash
rcoke.description: A common term by resistance members. 'Wash'ing refers to extracting the [REDACTED]'s power supply for further usage.

effects.title: im so close
effects.text: i just need one more thing. just please dont be another casualty -mag

amp.name: Patient Medication
amp.description: Patients are required to use it every twelve hours and must not turn it off until exactly 5 minutes have passed. Failure to comply will result in termination following a large dose of Class A amnestics.

effects.title: Complacent
effects.text: Empty. Soulless. Hungering for blood.

light.name: Your Holy Light
light.description: It's yours. Why would the NESS Foundation be obsessed?

effects.title: confusion
effects.text: what is this?
